name: Champion of the mountain!
description:
Title: Champion of the mountain!

 Platform: PC 

Game Genre: Platformer 

Rating: E 

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

Game Overview: Race to reach the top of the moutain against perilous foes. Beware the obstacles ahead fro no ordinary lego can become Champion of the Mountain!

 Instructions: use the WASD keys to move, and the SPACEBAR to jump, and the mosue to select menu options

 Game Design Team: Dillon Crawford - Game Designer
